metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Learn how to include HTML snippets in HTML.
content.html: Learn how to include HTML snippets in HTML.

content.text: Save the HTML you want to include in an .html file:
content.html: Save the HTML you want to include in an .html file:

content.code:
Google Maps
Animated Buttons
Modal Boxes
Animations
Progress Bars
Hover Dropdowns
Click Dropdowns
Responsive Tables
content.code_html:
<a href="howto_google_maps.asp">Google Maps</a><br>
<a href="howto_css_animate_buttons.asp">Animated Buttons</a><br>
<a href="howto_css_modals.asp">Modal Boxes</a><br>

<a href="howto_css_table_responsive.asp">Responsive Tables</a><br>

content.text: Including HTML is done by using a w3-include-html attribute:
content.html: Including HTML is done by using a w3-include-html attribute:

content.code_html: <div w3-include-html="content.html"></div>

content.text: HTML includes are done by JavaScript.

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* Loop through a collection of all HTML elements: */

/*search for 
   elements with a certain atrribute:*/
/* Make an HTTP request using the attribute value as the file name: */
/* Remove the attribute, and call this function once more: */

content.code:
<script>function includeHTML() {  var z, i, elmnt, file, xhttp;  
/* Loop through a collection of all HTML elements: */  z =
document.getElementsByTagName("*");  for (i = 0; i < z.length; i++)
{    elmnt = z[i];    /*search for
elements with a certain atrribute:*/    file =
elmnt.getAttribute("w3-include-html");    if (file) {
/* Make an HTTP request using the attribute value as the file name: */
xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
if (this.readyState == 4) {
if (this.status == 200) {elmnt.innerHTML = this.responseText;}
if (this.status == 404) {elmnt.innerHTML = "Page not found.";}
/* Remove the attribute, and call this function once more: */
elmnt.removeAttribute("w3-include-html");
includeHTML();        }
}       xhttp.open("GET", file, true);
xhttp.send();      /* Exit the function: */
return;    }  }}</script>

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Loop through a collection of all HTML elements: */

/*search for 
   elements with a certain atrribute:*/
/* Make an HTTP request using the attribute value as the file name: */
/* Remove the attribute, and call this function once more: */

content.code_html:
<script>
function includeHTML() {
  var z, i, elmnt, file, xhttp;
  /* Loop through a collection of all HTML elements: */
  z = document.getElementsByTagName("*");
  for (i = 0; i < z.length; i++) {
    elmnt = z[i];
    /*search for elements with a certain atrribute:*/
    file = elmnt.getAttribute("w3-include-html");
    if (file) {
      /* Make an HTTP request using the attribute value as the file name: */
      xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
      xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
        if (this.readyState == 4) {
          if (this.status == 200) {elmnt.innerHTML = this.responseText;}
          if (this.status == 404) {elmnt.innerHTML = "Page not found.";}
          /* Remove the attribute, and call this function once more: */
          elmnt.removeAttribute("w3-include-html");
          includeHTML();
        }
      }
      xhttp.open("GET", file, true);
      xhttp.send();
      /* Exit the function: */
      return;
    }
  }
}
</script>

syntax_highlighting_data.text: /* Loop through a collection of all HTML elements: */

/*search for 
   elements with a certain atrribute:*/
/* Make an HTTP request using the attribute value as the file name: */
/* Remove the attribute, and call this function once more: */

content.text: Call includeHTML() at the bottom of the page:
content.html: Call includeHTML() at the bottom of the page:

content.code_html:
<script>
includeHTML();
</script>

content.text: You can include any number of HTML snippets:
content.html: You can include any number of HTML snippets:

content.code_html:
<div w3-include-html="h1.html"></div>
<div w3-include-html="content.html"></div>
